articles.title: East Coast braces for powerful nor'easter
articles.description: As the Midwest digs out from heavy snow, the East Coast is bracing for a nor'easter as the current winter storm reorganizes along the coast. CNN Meteorologist Derek Van Dam has the details.

articles.title: Russian protesters rally in support of opposition leader Alexey Navalny
articles.description: Demonstrations in support of detained Russian opposition leader Alexey Navalny kicked off on Sunday in Russia's far east, as protesters turned out for a second successive weekend in defiance of authorities.

articles.title: As the Midwest digs out, the East Coast braces for a powerful nor'easter
articles.description: A long duration winter storm will bring a swath of heavy snow across the major metropolitans of the East Coast from Sunday to Wednesday. Strong winds will cause blowing snow and reduce visibility, making travel treacherous.
